statements: SELECT id, username, encrypted_password FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT username, encrypted_credit_card_info FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM sensitive_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, encrypted_credit_card_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT username, encrypted_credit_card_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT encrypted_password FROM sensitive_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, username FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE username LIKE '%e%';
SELECT id, name, email, sensitive_info FROM sensitive_data_encryption WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com'
SELECT name, id FROM sensitive_data_encryption ORDER BY name DESC

SELECT id, name FROM sensitive_data_encryption WHERE name LIKE 'A%'

SELECT * FROM sensitive_data_encryption WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_data_encryption WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, name, email FROM sensitive_data_encryption ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data_encryption WHERE name = 'John' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, name, email FROM sensitive_data_encryption WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensitive_data, id FROM encrypted_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM decryption_logs WHERE decryption_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM encrypted_data;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encrypted_data.id, encryption_keys.key_id FROM encrypted_data JOIN encryption_keys ON encrypted_data.id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT encrypted_data.id, decryption_logs.decryption_time FROM encrypted_data INNER JOIN decryption_logs ON encrypted_data.id = decryption_logs.encrypted_data_id;
SELECT * FROM decryption_logs ORDER BY decryption_time DESC;
SELECT encrypted_data.sensitive_data FROM encrypted_data WHERE id > 3;

SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_access WHERE access_level = 'admin';

SELECT encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT decryption_time, decrypted_data FROM decryption_history WHERE history_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY decryption_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_access WHERE access_level LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_key = (SELECT MAX(encryption_key) FROM encryption_keys);

SELECT id, name, encrypted_credit_card FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT user_id, encrypted_password FROM users WHERE username='admin';

SELECT name, encrypted_ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_records ORDER BY record_id DESC;

SELECT encrypted_records.record_id, encrypted_records.encrypted_data, encryption_keys.symmetric_key FROM encrypted_records INNER JOIN encryption_keys ON encrypted_records.encryption_key_id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT users.username, decrypted_password, decryption_time FROM users INNER JOIN decryption_logs ON users.user_id = decryption_logs.record_id ORDER BY decryption_time ASC;
